name: inimitably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very unusual or of very high quality and therefore impossible to copy: The book is written in an inimitably flamboyant style. She is best known for her inimitably witty songs about everyday life.
More examplesFewer examplesI answered the phone and immediately recognized the inimitably calm voice of my father.She responded to the minister's statement in her own inimitably sardonic style.After the concert he signed autographs for fans in his inimitably polite and patient way.
